channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
Well, I cant host my server but Port forwarded: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img211.imageshack.us/img211/4103/portforwardmt2.png[/img][/URL]
and my no-ip is running: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img509.imageshack.us/img509/2548/noipvt1.png[/img][/URL]
and my firewall also allows port 43594.. And I've got my server running to but others still can't join. what do i need to do?

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @magep00ner12 magep00ner12
item.description:
@magep00ner12 wrote:

[quote=“mage_burst, post:2, topic:192086”]Well, Have You Forwarded You’re Port’s Correctly? Go Over This And Make Sure You Did Everything Right.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

All Routers Are Very Simular, Just Look At The Pic’s And It’s Self Explaniary, Need More Help? PM Me.

And Also, IF There Is A “Both” As The Tcp Or Udp, Click Both, If Not U Have The Tcp And Udp Correct, When You Go To Put Ur Ip In At The End, You Have To Make Sure It Is You’re IP Adreess From Ipconfig From CMD, Make Sure You Don’t Enter The Defualt Gateway, Save Changes/OK Then You Should Be Able To Do It, If Not U Should Look Into Ur Client’s Port And Or You’re Server’s Port.[/quote]
I have both tcp and udp open and also both in my firewall settings open and i have no -ip and this running…

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @mage_burst mage_burst
item.description:
@mage_burst wrote:

Well, Have You Forwarded You’re Port’s Correctly? Go Over This And Make Sure You Did Everything Right.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

All Routers Are Very Simular, Just Look At The Pic’s And It’s Self Explaniary, Need More Help? PM Me.

And Also, IF There Is A “Both” As The Tcp Or Udp, Click Both, If Not U Have The Tcp And Udp Correct, When You Go To Put Ur Ip In At The End, You Have To Make Sure It Is You’re IP Adreess From Ipconfig From CMD, Make Sure You Don’t Enter The Defualt Gateway, Save Changes/OK Then You Should Be Able To Do It, If Not U Should Look Into Ur Client’s Port And Or You’re Server’s Port.

Read full topic
